price: If you are in danger[133], then pray while walking or riding. But when you are safe, remember Allah as He taught you what you did not know.
arabic: فَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ فَرِجَالًا أَوۡ رُكۡبَانٗاۖ فَإِذَآ أَمِنتُمۡ فَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَمَا عَلَّمَكُم مَّا لَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [133] Of an imminent danger such as enemies and the like.
